alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 28 at 2:20AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CHST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Until 315 AM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 220 AM ChST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.8 and 1.6 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.8 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Talofofo, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Inarajan, Asan, Merizo, Piti, Santa Rita and Umatac. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
